title: (x) serif face in old Premiere magazine issue - FF Scala {Yves}
content:
Does anyone recognize this font? Sorry about the bad quality.

I'm having trouble uploading the file. I keep getting a "File copy failed: no directory condigured, or it could not be accessed." error message. I'm trying to attach a rgb jpeg file and I can't figure out why it won't attach.
author: kwebb

comments.content: you need to post a sample for us to be able to ID the font.

If it is the sans, it could be [Bureau Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20130618013404/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BureauGrotesque) from Font Bureau.

If it is the serif, it could be [Eldorado](http://web.archive.org/web/20130618013404/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Eldorado) also from Font Bureau.

Hmm. In the 90s, Premiere and Entertainment Weekly both had great design going on, I could have the fonts confused. But, I thought I'd take a blind stab anyway.
Sorry about that. I was finally able to post it.

You nailed it! Thanks for the help.

— K
That's me, hammer in my hand, checking for any loose boards. :^P
